111.content:
A story about Billy Monk, a eight year old adopted boy who has not learned of his adoption, but will later find out in a series of events that his "mother" is a sweet and loving woman but with a rather large surprise that Billy will find out about.

Billy's father is out of town most of the time on business trips and appears in the story once in a while.
111.title: yes

113.content:
There are basically three styles of gender bender stories, so what kind would you like to try?

Body swap: The exchange of bodies between two characters, obviously it should be between a man and a woman. Is a TG story line after all.

Gender swap: A male turns into a female version of himslef and vice versa.

Crossdressing: There is no real physical transformation, but a "Trap" (A guy dressed like a girl that looks cuter or sexier than an actual girl) or a "Reverse Trap" (A girl dressed like a guy that looks more handsome than an actual guy) might be pretty interesting.

So what kind of Gender Bender you want to begin with?
113.title: Gender Bender

1221.title: Prince saves Prince

choices: Theodore is captured and must be rescued
Keith is captured and must be rescued
12213.content:
Long a go in the distant land of Morondo there were two brothers. Keith a 25 year old prince was next in line for the throne while his younger brother Theodore, who was 24 years old, was to be his partner and ally. The two brothers were looking at the status of the coronation ceremony. All was going well until something went wrong. Zoro the wicked warlock from the west decided to invade and take one of the princes to marry his daughter Agatha the witch of corruption.

"Brother! We must make our way to Lumon if we are to take down this heretic and his perverse daughter." said Theodore.

"Very well, my dear brother we shall split and try to meet up at Avorain Cross. If neither of us makes it out then the one who is left must gather forces to rescue the other." said Keith.

The two brothers split off and try to escape, but unfortunately one of them gets captured.
12213.title: The tale of two Brothers

1222.content:
and the age of the two?

Children's adventure: 10-14
Youth Adventure: 15-19
Adult adventure: 20+
1222.title: Princess saves Princess

12222.content:
Magic is no always just granted by divinity. And that was confirmed as the time passed.

By the year 2112 human technology reached the point were there was no difference between it and the magic descrived on fantasy books. But this is not the history of the moder magic, this is a story about those how train and learn about it.

The welcoming ceremony of the Pendragon Academy was going to take place surrounded by the shining cherry blossoms of the spring. It was delightful.

The students began to arrive about the seven o'clock under the cold light of the morning.

It was quite a view observing the boys and girls of the elit. After all, the Pendragon Academy was the number one magic school of the country.

And here it is where everything began.
12222.title: Vermillion Stigmata

12233.content: What setting would you like?
12233.title: Perilous Journey

choices: She arrives too late Zuna already destroyed the map
The priest explains the legendary treasure of Rosen to Sarah
122331.content:
It was another day in the kingdom of Rosen. The kind and loving Princess Sarah was expecting her best friend Sir Randal. Despite not being a prince he meant everything in the world to Sarah. She was going to throw a royal ball where there would be dancing and sport as noted by her swordswoman attire. When all the guests arrived she opened the ball. At the ball she declared that if any man could defeat her in swordplay she would marry the winner. This caused many to from far and wide in hope of besting the princess for she was unrivaled in swordplay. Now Randal actually came close to beating her one time but lost due to being distracted by the beauty. The night was going smoothly until one thing happened. The evil witch Zuna crashed the party.

"Ehehehe! Hello there. Mind if I take a few of these lads off your hands? They'll make the most excellent henchmen!"

Zuna then zaps one of the nobles. The noble slowly transforms into a monster. The former noble then strikes the other party guests transforming them into monsters as well.

"Sarah run to the church! There the priest will give you a map to the legendary treasure of Rosen. Only the treasure can save these men. Ouch! ... Run... Now... don't... worry... about... me..."

Randal then transforms into a monster. A hairy beast of some kind with a hunger for blood. Sarah then runs knowing that she is unable to save her friend from his cruel fate for now. She then runs to the church in order to obtain the map to Rosen's legendary treasure.
122331.title: Rise of the Beasts

1223312.content:
Sarah is relieved to see that the church is still intact and knocks on its ebony door.

"Hello, who is it?"

"It is I Princess Sarah. The wicked witch Zuna has invaded the kingdom and has turned all the nobles into savage beasts. My best friend Randal told me to find you before meeting the same cruel fate."

"I am truly sorrow your majesty. I'm afraid I don't have the whole map but take this piece of it along with this rune crystal. There's one thing you must know about the beasts and Zuna. The beasts can never be killed for they are protected by Zuna's dark magic. If you slay Zuna she will only reincarnate herself into a much more powerful form with each successive death. The only way to stop the curse is to trap Zuna in the Rosen Medallion. Only the Medallion can stop her for good for she'll be forced to wander for all eternity in the land of torment. I wish you well my friend for you will have a perilous journey."

Sarah then leaves the Church to find the next piece of the map to the Rosen Medallion. All seems well until she sees a town under siege. A man who is seriously wounded is seen hobbling on the road.

"Please ma'am our town is under attack from monsters. We tried killing them but their wounds heal in a matter of seconds. What's worse is that my friends have transformed into these very beasts before my eyes. I don't know how much longer I can retain my humanity. Aah!

The man then transforms into a beast.

"Foolish girl, there is no way that you'll defeat Mistress Zuna. For the age has come when she should take her rightful place as ruler of all. Prepare to submit to her majesty."

The beast attacks Sarah. Sarah outsmarts the beast by using her sword to cut down a beehive. The angry bees start stinging the beast. Knowing that there is no way to kill the beasts or Zuna without dire consequences. When Sarah enters the town she notices that the town is empty. She then checks for survivors. She then notices that the water barrel that was by one of the houses a second ago has moved. Sarah then tips over the barrel only for a young man wearing a robe to fall out.

"What's the big idea! Can't you see..."

The magician notices that the beasts had left town.

"What happened here?"

"We were attacked by Zuna's henchmen. They were more like a mix between werewolves and demons. Their leader was a blood red by what I call a Zurn. He lead his fellow Zurns to attack the town I hid in a water barrel to avoid death by it seems I was lucky to survive."

"Your act of cowardice might have potentially made you a useful ally against Zuna. Will you swear to take up arms and serve your country."

"Sure if that witch is going to destroy towns and cities then you can count me in."

"Good we need to find the Rosen Medallion so we can return innocent people back into humans."

"Wait those things were once human?! No wonder they understood what we were saying. I am Nicholas Sparks grand magician at your service your majesty. So where are we going Lady Sarah?"

"First we are heading to..."
1223312.title: The Treasure of Rosen

12233122.content:
"First we are heading to Sunvalacity. We will fins the second part of the map their." said Sarah looking into the distance.

"I shall be of great service my liege." said Nicholas with his fist raised.

So with her new ally Sarah was determined to save her love Randal from Zuna's mind control. When Sarah and her friend arrived at Sunvalacity she noticed a woman about her age dressed in priestly robes. She was none other than the priestess of Sunvalacity working to serve the Lord when the darkest hour arrived. For the sun eclipsed every few days and the rise of Zuna could mean doom to the city.

"Praise be unto the Lord. He sent two heros to rescue us from our burden."

"Pardon me holy Mother but what are you speaking about?" asked Nicholas.

"I am Mother Daphne carrier of the map piece that leads to the Rosen Medallion. The Lord has sent you on a quest to save the land from wickedness."

"I am Princess Sarah Rose and this is Nicholas Sparks. Tell us Mother Daphne what is troubling this fair city."

"Every few days the sun eclipses and the people outside go into madness. Yet they do not return after the event. I know that they're alive but the Zurns must have bitten them. I pray that I do not join the ranks of the slaves of Zuna for only wickedness lies in her soul."

"This looks like one mystery that we'll have to solve." said Sarah.

"Mother Daphne how long has this been occurring?" asked Nicholas.

"A few months."

"Very well we shall what caused this." said Sarah.

"Let me guide you to the library. There you should find some useful information on what you'll need."
12233122.title: Sunvalacity

122331221.content:
Mother Daphne then guides the heroes to the library.

"Here we are. This is Sunvalacity Library. Feel free to do some research." said Mother Daphne.

"Thank you blessed Mother." responded Sarah.

The two heroes then begin collecting some research. After a few hours Nicholas finds something.

"Hey Sarah I found something interesting." said Nicholas.

"What is it?" asked Sarah.

"It's said that this town has a curse that strikes the city every 100 years. Every 100 years a creature known as a Laloopon causes the people to go mad. The Laloopon is said to feed off of this madness. Once the victim is drained they turn into statues. The statues then become Laloopons after seven months." said Nicholas.

"Let me get this straight. You're saying that these Laloopons feed off of insanity to procreate more Laloopons?" questioned Sarah.

"That's right." replied NIcholas.

"So they're similar to Zurns except they stone beasts." said Sarah.

"Not exactly, but the stone beast part is correct. They're more like related to gargoyles than Zurns." replied Nicholas.

"So how do we beat them?" asked Sarah.

"Well we..."
122331221.title: Uncovering the Mystery

143.content:
My name is Calamity Coyote and this is my horror story about how i turned into a giant rampaging coyote terrorizing all of Acme Acres.

One day at Acme University, I Calamity coyote was in my laboratory experimenting with a growth serum that i made and of course drank it down to see if it would work or not.

"Okay the serum's been drunk now i have to wait and see if it works or not" I said.

Suddenly i started shaking uncontrollably for some unknown reason as i started getting larger while i was taking up so much space in the laboratory and university until i outgrew the roof and was just standing there trying to figure out what happened.

"The serum worked, I'm now a giant" my now booming voice said.

Now what happens next?
143.title: Horror
